title: Block Players
body: Is there no block players option in the alpha client? or am I just terribly blind?

replies.body:
They moved it into the options menu.

Second from the bottom if I remember correctly.
but there is no option to add people
Having the same issue,i found the blocked people list in options but there is no option to block new people.

i dont find it either. usually after game ended there was the option nearby the players name to block them, but now there is only gifting/honor/add friend and reporting available.....
does anybody know how to block players in this new beta client?
Yeah this needs to be address as i keep finding racists and toxic players
I would like to know also if I could still block players
Not being able to block someone from the post-game screen by simply right-clicking their name is fucking stupid as shit.
